name: hacker-menu
description: A menu to read Hacker News

scripts.compress: rm hacker-menu.dmg && hdiutil create -format UDZO -srcfolder 'Hacker Menu-darwin-x64/Hacker Menu.app' hacker-menu.dmg
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-packager . 'Hacker Menu' --out hacker-menu-mac --overwrite --sign='Developer ID Application: Jingwen Ou' --icon='images/Icon@1024.icns' --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --version=0.31.1 --ignore='src' --ignore='node_modules/(babel|standard|csscomb)' --ignore='node_modules/electron-(packager|prebuild|rebuild)'
scripts.release: npm run package && npm run compress

author: Jingwen Owen Ou
